welcomeText1: Welcome to the official platform of the
heroDescription: A community of students united by diversity, solidarity, and knowledge. Discover the general guide to student life, academic pathways, and learn more about who we are.
presidentMessageTitle: Message from the President of the Nigerien Students Association at Zaria
presidentMessage: Hello everyone, you are warmly welcome to our digital platform. This website was created to support you throughout your academic journey in Zaria, Kaduna State, Nigeria. We strongly believe in solidarity, excellence, and knowledge sharing in order to build a united and inspiring student community.
activitiesDescription: Explore images from our activities, events, and key moments of the association.
missionDescription: Our association, which brings together Nigerien students in Nigeria, aims to guide and support new students who wish to pursue their studies in this country. We provide continuous assistance until the successful completion of their studies, help them improve their English language skills, and prepare them for innovative entrepreneurship programs.
visionDescription: Our vision is that all Nigerien students who come to study in Zaria, once graduated, return to Niger to contribute to the countryâ€™s economic, social, and cultural development.
guideHeader: Welcome to the general guide to available programs and student life in Zaria
guideSubHeader: This guide was designed to help new Nigerien students understand administrative procedures, life in Zaria, and the academic programs available in Nigeria.
documentTranslationText: Each document translation is charged at
aboutIntro: We are an association operating under the international Student Association (ISA). Our mission is to unite Nigerien students in Zaria within a framework of mutual support, cultural integration, and academic development.
aboutClosing: Together, we form an international community united by diversity, solidarity, and the pursuit of academic excellence.
roleSport: Secretary for Sports and Cultural Affairs
contactSubtitle: Feel free to reach out to us for any information or assistance.
languagePreparationText: We have 3 to 4 language program centers. Registration fees range between 50,000 and 80,000 naira depending on the selected center.
otherInstitutionsList: NITT (Nigerian Institute of Transportation and Technology) â€” Institute of transportation and logistics
NILEST (Nigerian Institute of Leather Research Institute of Science and Technology) â€” Leather institute (very important for our country)
welcomeHouse: Welcome house with free accommodation for new arrivals, for a maximum duration of 4 days
membershipFee: Welcome fee and membership card: 5,000 NGN
essentialItemsList: Other equipment depending on your needs
Advice: bringing your own materials is an advantage
Bringing goumba for kounou is highly recommended ðŸ˜„
lifeInZariaTips: Samaru and Zango are the closest areas to the institutions in Zaria, Kaduna, Nigeria
Avoid going out at night after 10:00 PM
Be cautious with strangers, especially new acquaintances
Our team will be available to help you find safe accommodation
